choices.text: You are given $n$ mirrors, numbered from $1$ to $n$. Every day, Creatnx asks exactly one mirror "Am I beautiful ". The $i$-th mirror will tell Creatnx that he is beautiful with probability $\frac{p_i}{100}$ for all $1 \le i \le n$. Creatnx asks the mirrors one by one, starting from the $1$-st mirror. Every day, if he asks $i$-th mirror, there are two possibilities:
